title: 如何设置不让mm怪受到攻击前乱跑
author: 柠檬好酸
txt_content: 如何设置不让mm怪受到攻击前乱跑

replies.author: dreepr322
replies.txt_content:
cs:
  Mobtype: pigzombie
  Display: 'cs'
  Health: 200
  Damage: 1
  Equipment:
  Skills:
  AIGoalSelectors:
  - 0 Clear
  - 1 meleeattack
  - 2 LookAtPlayers
  Options:
    MovementSpeed: 0.26
    FollowRange: 10
    AlwaysShowName: true
    PreventItemPickup: true
    PreventLeashing:  true
    PreventOtherDrops: true
    PreventRandomEquipment: true
    PreventRenaming:  true
    Silent: true
    KnockbackResistance: 1

replies.author: pepsi小唐
replies.txt_content:
配置里设置ai选项只攻击
攻击本身的生物
不太可能吧，站着让人打= =
